name: Mom's Portuguese Beef Stew
author: dolcevita
summary: This is a favorite home meal from my mom. My sister had to write while my mom cooked in order to get the recipe right. It's easy and will impress anyone. Serve steaming hot on a bed of white rice.
ingredients: 1 pound beef stew meat, cut into cubes
directions: Heat the oil in a stockpot over medium-high heat
Dust the beef with the flour
Place the beef, garlic, bay leaves, and pepper in the stockpot; cook until the beef is brown; season with salt and cook until beef is tender, about 5 minutes
Add the onion, green pepper, carrot, and paprika; cook until the onion softens, about 5 minutes
Stir in the tomato, wine, water, and parsley
Cover, reduce heat to medium-low and simmer 30 minutes
Mix in the red potatoes, sweet potatoes, and green beans; continue to cook until potatoes are easily pierced through with a fork, about 45 minutes
